text: Sohail Khan (; born 6 March 1984) is a Pakistani cricketer. A right-arm fast bowler, he gained instant recognition during his debut first-class season in 2007 when he broke Fazal Mahmood's record for the best bowling figures by a Pakistani in a first-class match.Sohail Khan bags 16 wickets to shred record books. Cricinfo.com. Retrieved on 2008-03-11. Shortly afterwards he made his international debut, in an ODI against Zimbabwe. Khan was part of the team for 2015 Cricket World Cup.Sohail Khan. Cricinfo.com. Retrieved on 2008-03-11. ==References== Category:Pakistani cricketers Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Sohail Khan (cricketer)
